title: 93x18: Adequacy of Agency’s Finding of “Agency Interest” in a Widely Attended Gathering
summary: The OGE said such free attendance at meetings would probably be prohibited by 5 C.F.R. § 2635.202, unless allowed as a widely attended gathering, for which the OGE determined this did not qualify. The OGE determined that a blanket determination that meetings of this time are in the agency's interest was inadequate.
